video.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
video.synopsis: The Cat in the Hat is back -- and this time, he's teaching Sally and her brother, Nick, some awfully nifty things to think about!

episodes.synopsis: Queen Priscilla Buzzoo invites Sally and Nick to join in the bee dance to learn how to make honey; the kids learn how and why birds migrate.
episodes.title: Show Me the Honey / Migration Vacation

episodes.synopsis: The Cat takes Nick and Sally on an adventure to meet animals that stay up all night; the kids meet a hermit crab who's looking for a new shell.
episodes.title: I Love the Nightlife / Oh Give Me a Home!

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally visit an ant colony and learn that teamwork makes almost anything possible; Mrs. Robin shows the kids how to build a nest.
episodes.title: Many Ants Make Light Work / Nest Best Thing

episodes.synopsis: The Cat brings Nick and Sally to the biggest sandbox they'll ever see; Nick and Sally learn how whales communicate by singing.
episodes.title: A Plan for Sand / Whale Music

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally meet three different creatures that depend on flowers to live; the kids have just built a "snowcat," but it's starting to melt!
episodes.title: Flower Power / Snowman's Land

episodes.synopsis: Mindy the caterpillar shows Nick and Sally how she makes silk; Nick and Sally have been playing in the mud, and now they need to get clean!
episodes.title: Dress Up Day / Bathtime

episodes.synopsis: The kids learn how different animals spend their entire lives in trees; Nick and Sally are playing hide-and-seek, but Sally keeps getting found!
episodes.title: Tree's Company / Now You See Me

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally explore each level of the rain forest; Slyde the snake shows Nick and Sally how he sheds his skin when it gets too small for him.
episodes.title: The Rain Game / No Sssweater Is Better

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally get to try out different animal tails in the jungle; with the help of Betty Beaver, Nick discovers a new way to play the drums.
episodes.title: A Tale About Tails / Sticky Situation

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally learn how fireflies communicate by flashing their lights; the kids learn about all the different ways snails use their shells.
episodes.title: Night Lights / Go Snails, Go!

episodes.synopsis: After a fun race with a penguin and a gull, Sally and Nick learn that not all birds fly; the kids try to fly a kite, but there's not enough wind.
episodes.title: Flight of the Penguins / Let's Go Fly a Kite

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally meet one of the best dancers in the world; the Cat introduces the kids to Zapata the bat, who teaches them about echolocation.
episodes.title: You Should Be Dancing / Batty for Bats

episodes.synopsis: The Cat takes Nick and Sally on a pirate adventure; Terry the termite teaches Nick and Sally how to build a tower that won't wiggle and wobble.
episodes.title: Maps / Termite Towers

episodes.synopsis: Stan the bower bird teaches Sally and Nick how to decorate with almost anything; Larry the limpet shows the kids how to hang onto rocks.
episodes.title: The Lost Egg / Hold on Tight

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally learn how to jump from grasshoppers, a kangaroo and a flea; Onslow the sloth shows Nick and Sally that it's good to be slow sometimes.
episodes.title: Jump! / Slow Down for Sloths

episodes.synopsis: Cat takes the kids to meet an expert on rainbows; learning about different animals' paws, hooves and feet helps Nick and Sally solve a mystery.
episodes.title: Chasing Rainbows / Follow the Prints

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick are so excited to go ice skating tomorrow that they can't fall asleep; Sally and Nick learn how trees "eat" through leaves and roots.
episodes.title: A Long Winter's Nap / The Tree Doctor

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally follow Sam the salmon on her incredible journey upriver; giant panda Zhu Zhu shows the kids all the fun things you can do with bamboo.
episodes.title: Incredible Journey / Bamboozled

episodes.synopsis: Nick is trying to make his mother a surprise lunch, but she keeps coming into the kitchen; Nick can't remember where he put his yo-yo.
episodes.title: Thump! / Squirrelled Away

episodes.synopsis: Sheldon the tortoise teaches Nick and Sally an important lesson about friendship; the kids learn how to milk a cow on Finola's farm.
episodes.title: Pick Your Friends / Finola's Farm

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally can't find their sled under the snow; Mabel the spider teaches Nick and Sally how to weave a web.
episodes.title: Reindeer Games / Along Came a Spider

episodes.synopsis: Cat takes Nick and Sally to meet a variety of single-celled creatures; Nick and Sally are going on an adventure, but how are they going to get there?
episodes.title: Teeny Weeny Adventure / I See Seeds

episodes.synopsis: Luis the armadillo teaches Nick and Sally how to somersault; Grayson the wolf pup shows the kids how wolves howl to communicate and find each other.
episodes.title: Surprise, Surprise / A Howling Good Time

episodes.synopsis: Diggery the earthworm shows Sally and Nick how plant roots need water, air and compost; Rocky the winter wren helps the kids learn how to whistle.
episodes.title: Secret Super Digger / Pucker Up and Blow

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick learn how Whiffy the skunk protects himself with his own special smell; Sally and Nick want to make scary Halloween masks.
episodes.title: Sniff and Seek / Aye Aye!

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally are trying out their new rubber boots, but they keep getting stuck in the mud; the Cat takes Nick and Sally to a coral reef.
episodes.title: Blue Feet Are Neat / Reef Magic

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick learn how different animals stay cool; Themba the elephant shows Sally and Nick all the different things she can do with her trunk.
episodes.title: Be Cool / Elephant Walk

episodes.synopsis: Bernadette the monarch butterfly teaches Sally and Nick all about fluttering; Pinkie the flamingo shows the kids some dance moves.
episodes.title: Flutter By Butterfly / Pretty in Pink

episodes.synopsis: Aurilia the angler fish guides Nick and Sally to the very bottom of the ocean floor; the kids learn why the puddle in their backyard has disappeared.
episodes.title: Digging the Deep / Puddle Puzzle

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally meet creatures who use kelp for both food and protection; the kids wish they were tall enough to get their ball out of a tree.
episodes.title: Help with Kelp / Treetop Tom

episodes.synopsis: The Cat in the Hat takes Sally and Nick trick-or-treating; the kids meet King Cecil the Seahorse, who takes all his babies wherever he goes!
episodes.title: Trick or Treat / King Cecil the Seahorse

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally set off on a safari with the Cat to find all kinds of stripes; the kids go to Finola's Farm to learn how to get wool from sheep.
episodes.title: Stripy Safari / Wool

episodes.synopsis: Eddy the honeyguide bird helps Sally and Nick attract customers to their café; Charlie the chimpanzee teaches Sally and Nick how to swing from a rope.
episodes.title: A Sweet Deal / King of Swing

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally learn that guinea pigs love playing hide-and-seek; Walker the water strider shows Nick and Sally how he can stay on top of the water.
episodes.title: Amazing Eyes / Water Walkers

episodes.synopsis: Sandy the sand hopper teaches Sally and Nick the difference between natural "garbage" and human-made trash; the kids learn about conserving water.
episodes.title: Super Cleaner Uppers / Itty Bitty Water

episodes.synopsis: The Cat introduces Sally and Nick to a snow leopard, a cheetah and a lion; on Finola's farm, Sally and Nick learn how to turn wheat into flour.
episodes.title: Big Cats / Fantastic Flour

episodes.synopsis: A group of meerkats shows Sally and Nick how to camp safely in their backyard; Sally and Nick learn how leaves help trees make food.
episodes.title: Minnie Meerkat / Leaves

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick meet animals with different hairstyles; Polly the polar bear introduces the kids to the different kinds of ice that make up her home.
episodes.title: Hooray for Hair / Ice Is Nice

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick are trying to guess what they'll be when they grow up; Sally and Nick can't seem to find Harvey the guinea pig.
episodes.title: When I Grow Up / Doing It Differently

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally visit the magical Garden of Seasons; the kids and their friends have a party for Candy, a goose who's flying south for the winter.
episodes.title: Seasons: Spring and Summer / Seasons: Fall and Winter

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally discover gravity when they try to jump high enough to touch the moon; Nick keeps sneezing when he and Sally are playing hide-and-seek.
episodes.title: Jumping on the Moon / Sneezy Riders

episodes.synopsis: The Cat shows Nick and Sally a special bean -- that suddenly moves; the Cat takes Nick and Sally to meet animals with amazing ears.
episodes.title: Inside Out / Hear Here

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Twiggles shows the Cat, Nick and Sally how rubber is made from trees; the kids meet Timmy Tippy Toe the klipspringer, who's an expert climber.
episodes.title: Bounce / Timmy Tippy Toe

episodes.synopsis: Astronaut Audrey teaches Nick and Sally about night and day; Cat's friend Hilda the hippo knows all about having fun in the sun.
episodes.title: No Night Today / Fun in the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally must protect their cookie jar from cookie snatchers; the kids see how Treetop Tom's tough tongue can pick food off of thorny branches.
episodes.title: Meet the Beetles / Tongue Tied

episodes.synopsis: Manatees Matilda and Marlon teach Nick and Sally how to swim slowly and gracefully; Nick and Sally learn a song about making chocolate.
episodes.title: Manatees and Mermaids / The Last Chocolate

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally are trying to guess which animal is the toughest; the Cat needs help getting his fish friend Ting Tang Tony back to his family.
episodes.title: Tough Enough / How Cool Is Coral

episodes.synopsis: Sally looks after some baby hamsters; the Cat introduces Nick and Sally to Perry the peregrine falcon, the fastest creature in the world!
episodes.title: Babies / Fast

episodes.synopsis: The kids meet Lars the lemming, who uses the snow to help keep warm; Dr. Giggles teaches Nick and Sally how the heart pumps blood.
episodes.title: Little Lemmings / Keep the Beat

episodes.synopsis: Cat's friend Clarence the cricket shows Sally and Nick how crickets make noise; Sally collects peacock feathers for her hat.
episodes.title: Name That Sound / Fabulous Feathers

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick are practicing to be in a three-legged race; the kids are astonished to learn that you can make clothes from plants!
episodes.title: Take a Walk / Cotton Patch

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally take a super-shrunken trip into Thing One's stomach; the kids go on a journey around the universe and learn the names of the planets.
episodes.title: Rumbly Tumbly / Planet Name Game

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick meet lots of animals with different types of feet; Mimi the mimic octopus gives the kids tips on how to pretend to be someone else.
episodes.title: Step This Way / Anything You Can Do

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally learn that gorillas build nests to sleep in; Cat's lizard friends show Nick and Sally how to pretend to be dragons.
episodes.title: Gorillas in the Nest / Tale of a Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Sally, Nick and Cat blast off into space and meet Audrey the astronaut; Nick and Sally learn about bones from Dr. Giggles.
episodes.title: Top of the Sky / Jiggle Bones

episodes.synopsis: Gina the giraffe weevil gives Sally and Nick tips for wrapping presents; Cat's friend Penny the pelican teaches the kids how to catch things in water.
episodes.title: Wrappers Delight / Dive Swim Scoop

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Twiggles shows Sally and Nick how to make new paper out of old paper by recycling; Cat's friend Polly the polar bear loves the snow!
episodes.title: Paper Chase / A Polar Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick learn about balancing from Zappa the snow leopard; Cat's friend Sharky McGee explains how sand is turned into glass.
episodes.title: Balancing Act / Marvelous Marbles

episodes.synopsis: Sally and Nick meet Os the ostrich and learn that not all birds can fly; Sally and Nick go inside Thing One's ear to explore.
episodes.title: Biggest Bird / Drum Di Drum

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Sally shrink down to learn about skin from Dr. Giggles; the kids meet Rufus, Cat's cleaner fish friend who's an expert on cleaning.
episodes.title: The Skin I'm In / Fishy Washy
